extendedInfo.description: Solar Status displays information from your Enphase microinvertors of your photovoltaic system.  It shows the current power, today's energy, last 7 days energy, lifetime energy, min energy, max energy, average energy, the date and time of the latest update, a graph of the current day's power, a graph of your best and worst day, and indicates your peak power for the day.  Touch screen to see financial data based on your inputs.  Swipe left/right on graph to see previous days.  Supports multiple systems, swipe left/right below graph to change between them and enter your friend's API keys to add their system.  You will need to get an API key from your Enlighten login to use and the first update will take more time as it loads history.  Please email solarstatus@corocks.com for support.

reviews.title: Great app.
reviews.comment: I love this little app.  It doesn\'t allow drill down, per panel, reporting, or movies like the enphase website, but it does provide a nice, clean dashboard for current performance vs. previous day and \'best day\'.  Pros: -Worked without a hitch -Graph layout is smart and attractive.   -Simple  Cons: -Little documentation.  For example, graph compares \'maximum day\' output curve to \'current day\' and \'previous day\' - but not clear what maximum day is.  For my system, it is the max day in the last 6 months, but not in the last 18 months.  Comment:  Enphase overestimates my electric generation by about 10%.  It would be nice (and easy) to allow user to \'downrate\' what enphase reports by a factor, so that the reporting is accurate.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best if your addicted to watching your production
reviews.comment: Simple and to the point.  Love the overlay of the best and worst day.  Makes it easy to see if your going to hit your target for the day.  Having this info allows you to analyze your production to best utilize your electricity.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works great
reviews.comment: More useful in many ways then Enphase\'s own web site. Love the max energy overlay but the min overlay doesn\'t help much since I list power for 20 hours yesterday so it just ends up a red line at the bottom.  Could you make a widget?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Just works
reviews.comment: Works great on Nexus 7. Thanks for making this.  Looking forward to future updates/features.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: I would like to see a table compatible version of the app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Just the thing I\'ve been wanting!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Spotty performance, at best.
reviews.comment: Fails to connect more than half the time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Use it every day
reviews.comment: Fast to access.  Keeps track of system output.  Would be great if it had the time at the bottom of the graph.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app!!!
reviews.comment: Perfect to keep tabs on the solar array out.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool & Useful
reviews.comment: Great app to monitor your Enphase solar system production status in near real time.  App data is much \"fresher\" than that found on the Enlighten website.    Many thanks for this excellent tool.  Ed
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: It took me a while too figure out what all the curves were and too type in thr api code. But all in all a well designed and clear app. Well done !!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: great
reviews.comment: gladly paid after playing with the free beta. keep up the good work. may i suggest adding inverter temp graph overlay? also, the time machine effect is gone... :) yey!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app for Enphase inverter monitoring
reviews.comment: Helped test this app with the developer, and just happily upgraded to the paid version. Thanks.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: For anyone with an Enphase solar system, this is a great app to monitor your system in real-time from an Android device.  Developer responsive to suggestions.
reviews.author: A Google User
